data.actual_result: The Quick Switcher looks like closed for a split second and then comes back with a vertical sliding animation as if you just opened it
data.expected_result: You get back to Quick Switcher without any animation as it is supposed to be already open
data.short_description: The Quick Switcher re-does the vertical sliding animation everytime you press Home button and come back via multi-tasking
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Quick Switcher - Press Home button of your phone - Come back using multi-tasking (not via homescreen icon as the QS will completely close due to another issue)
